original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya

original: 9.15. Piṭṭhiduka, Kusalattika
analyzed: piṭṭhiduka kusalattika

original: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanadassanena pahātabbaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na na dassanena pahātabbam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na bhāvanāya pahātabbam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na na bhāvanāya pahātabbam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabba hetukam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na na dassanena pahātabba hetuka

original: nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: pe na na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā pañca pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava

original: Nasavitakkaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naavitakkaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na sa vitakkam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na avitakkam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… nasavicāraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naavicāraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: pe na sa vicāram na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na avicāram na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… nasappītikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naappītikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: pe na sappītikam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na appītikam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… napītisahagataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanapītisahagataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: pe na pīti sahagatam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na na pīti sahagatam na kusalam dhamma

original: paṭicca …pe… nasukhasahagataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanasukhasahagataṁ nakusalaṁ
analyzed: paṭicca pe na sukha sahagatam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na na sukha sahagatam na kusala

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naupekkhāsahagataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanaupekkhāsahagataṁ
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe na aupekkhā sahagatam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na na aupekkhā sahagata

original: nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe purejāte āsevane cha pe avigate nava

original: Nakāmāvacaraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanakāmāvacaraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na kāmāvacaram na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na na kāmāvacaram na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… narūpāvacaraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanarūpāvacaraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: pe na rūpāvacaram na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na na rūpāvacaram na kusalam dhamma

original: paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paṭicca saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cattāri adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe cha pe purejāte āsevane dve pe avigate nava

original: Naarūpāvacaraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanaarūpāvacaraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na arūpāvacaram na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na na arūpāvacaram na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca

original: Napariyāpannaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naapariyāpannaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na pariyāpannam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na a pariyāpannam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe āsevane ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Naniyyānikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naaniyyānikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na niyyānikam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na aniyyānikam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Naniyataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naaniyataṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na niyatam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na aniyatam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nasauttaraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naanuttaraṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sauttaram na kusalam dhammam paṭicca pe na anuttaram na akusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe āsevane ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na saraṇam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naaraṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na araṇam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na araṇaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naaraṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na araṇam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naaraṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nakusalo ca naaraṇo nakusalo ca dhammā
analyzed: na araṇam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na kusalo ca na araṇaḥ na kusalo ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nakusalañca naaraṇaṁ nakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saraṇam na kusalañca na araṇam na kusalañca dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saraṇam na akusalam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā eka sabbattha eka

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na saraṇam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naaraṇaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na araṇam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca na araṇaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: hetuyā dve ārammaṇe dve pe avigate dve

original: (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāre pi pe pañhā vāre pi sabbattha vitthāro
